name: Newpath Web
tagline: Web Design & Development, SEO, AdWords, Mob Apps
description:
Newpath web is an Australian owned, full service digital agency with its headquarters in Melbourne, Australia, with offices in Sydney, Brisbane, and the UK. With a team of nearly 200 developers, designers and online marketers we deliver all your digital needs including websites, mobile apps, custom software and online marketing. We pride ourselves on customer service and completing all projects, with high quality and customer satisfaction.
Core services include:
websites that convert traffic into sales
online marketing, SEO & PPC with clear ROI
mobile apps that engage
software that drives competitive advantage
eCommerce solutions that convert
We specialise in UX design, web design, CMS platforms, WordPress, Drupal, Kentico, Magento, Umbraco, Sitecore, and many others, in addition to building native iOS & Android apps, Node.JS development, business analysis, outsourced quality assurance and software testing, the Internet of Things, and Blockchain Software Development.
